Rule.Name: Ensure runtime parameters are reviewed and documented
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Attack vectors and runtime parameters are not well understood, which may expose the server to misconfigurations.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure that the PostgreSQL runtime parameters are reviewed, documented, and securely configured.

Rule.Name: Ensure backend runtime parameters are configured correctly
Rule.NonCompliantComment: 'backend' runtime parameters are not configured correctly, which may reduce performance or security.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Configure 'backend' runtime parameters such as max_connections and shared_buffers.

Rule.Name: Ensure postmaster runtime parameters are configured correctly
Rule.NonCompliantComment: 'Postmaster' runtime parameters are not configured, which may affect server performance and security.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Configure 'Postmaster' runtime parameters correctly. Example: listen_addresses='localhost'

Rule.Name: Ensure SIGHUP runtime parameters are configured correctly
Rule.NonCompliantComment: 'SIGHUP' runtime parameters are not configured, which may impact configuration changes.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure 'SIGHUP' runtime parameters are configured to allow runtime reloads without restart.

Rule.Name: Ensure superuser runtime parameters are configured to restrict privileges
Rule.NonCompliantComment: 'Superuser' runtime parameters are not configured, which may allow excessive privileges.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Configure 'Superuser' runtime parameters to restrict privileges. Example: ALTER ROLE postgres WITH NOSUPERUSER;

Rule.Name: Ensure user runtime parameters are configured securely
Rule.NonCompliantComment: 'User' runtime parameters are not configured correctly, which may allow excessive privileges.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure 'User' runtime parameters are configured correctly to restrict user actions.

Rule.Name: Ensure FIPS 140-2 OpenSSL cryptography is enabled
Rule.NonCompliantComment: FIPS 140-2 OpenSSL cryptography is not used, which may weaken cryptographic security.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Enable FIPS-compliant OpenSSL by setting ssl_library_path to the appropriate library path.

Rule.Name: Ensure TLS is enabled and properly configured
Rule.NonCompliantComment: TLS is not enabled or not configured correctly, which may allow unencrypted connections.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Enable TLS by setting ssl=on and specifying certificate and key file paths.

Rule.Name: Ensure minimum TLS protocol version is TLSv1.3
Rule.NonCompliantComment: TLSv1.3 or later is not configured, which may allow use of outdated protocols.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Set ssl_min_protocol_version to TLSv1.3 or higher.

Rule.Name: Ensure weak SSL/TLS ciphers are disabled
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Weak SSL/TLS ciphers are enabled, which may allow weak encryption.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable weak ciphers by setting ssl_ciphers to strong cipher suites.

Rule.Name: Ensure pgcrypto extension is installed and configured
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The pgcrypto extension is not installed or not configured correctly, which may limit cryptographic capabilities.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Install the pgcrypto extension and configure it properly.
Rule.Correction: dnf install postgresql-pgcrypto -y; psql -c "CREATE EXTENSION pgcrypto;"
